title: Online Engineering Microlearning Course Based on Collaborative Constructivism

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A program to strengthen engineering problem-solving capabilities in social contexts for current practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can build a collaborative discussion community for engineering problem-solving using online collaboration tools.
Learners can analyze social application cases of engineering theories through 15-minute microlearning content in mobile environments.
Learners can provide constructive feedback on peer learnersâ€™ solutions at least three times via a peer review system.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
